summary: REQ-1 appears implemented by setting the initial React state for `name` to "Ghazal" in `frontend/src/App.tsx`. No missing requirements are evident from the provided diff summary. However, the diff also includes modifications to metadata/summary files that were not requested in the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/added project tracking metadata (new_feature_requests, pending statuses, etc.) in project_state.json
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to revert the default displayed name; it does not request updates to project tracking/metadata files.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated the repository summary text describing many unrelated UI/features (e.g., background music controls, expanded dialogue messages, no-button behavior details, styling palette/fonts)
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly limits scope to changing the default displayed name only and lists non-goals such as not modifying dialogue messages, no-button behavior, or styling; editing a summary file to describe these items is not requested.
